website_summaries.verdict: Chances are you will find Palladio's lip stain colors work well for you, but it comes with some downsides including limited longevity in the package and on the lips.
pros: Available in several color options that complement different skin tones
Easy to apply, thanks to the pen-like applicator
cons: Color tends to fade fairly quickly
Dries out fairly fast in the tube
Dries out the lips, but can easily be paired with a lip gloss
